Gochujang Chicken Breast

Ingredients

  • 2-3 Chicken Breasts
  • 2 tbsp Soy Sauce
  • 4 Garlic Cloves, minced
  • 1 tbsp Honey
  • 1 tbsp Rice Vinegar
  • 1 tbsp Sesame Oil

Instructions

  1. Chop chicken into pieces
  2. Mix in marinade in a bowl, add chicken
  3. Marinade chicken overnight
  4. Stir fry when ready to eat
